Materialising in front of the base was a sight which
would have stuck both awe and fear into those who had
been veterans of the Great war, as Grimlock and
Bludgeon both materialised in front of the Maximal
base.  Both immediately shot the other looks as to
their opinions of one another, however both accepted
that trhis was neither the time nor the place- they
could settle their differences another time.

Following their teleportation, a bot unrecognisable to
the other maximals materialised, he clearly had the
look of a maximal gestalt, however he was one that no
maximal had ever seen before.

Magnaboss stood patiently and waited- he knew his old
friends Rodimus and Kup were counting on him.
